faqs.question: What is Quick Foods (CaCo)?
faqs.answer: Quick Foods (CaCo) is a platform that connects catering service providers across Bangladesh. We allow customers to explore catering services, order meals, and even book services for events. We also offer delivery services and student-friendly meal packages.

faqs.question: How can I find catering service providers on your platform?
faqs.answer: Visit our website and browse by category, division, or area. You can filter providers based on ratings, services offered, and customer reviews to find the best fit for your needs.

faqs.question: What kind of meal packages do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer customizable meal packages, including breakfast, lunch, snacks, and dinner. We also have budget-friendly packages for students.

faqs.question: How do I place an order?
faqs.answer: To place an order, browse our list of providers, select your desired service or meal, and follow the checkout process on the website. Youâ€™ll receive a confirmation email once the order is placed.

faqs.question: Does Quick Foods handle food delivery?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide reliable delivery services for orders placed through our platform. We ensure timely delivery to your location.

faqs.question: Can I schedule an order for a specific date and time?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! When placing an order, you can choose your preferred delivery date and time.

faqs.question: How can I list my catering service on Quick Foods?
faqs.answer: Catering service providers can fill out the *Add Your Listing* form on our website. Once approved, your services will be listed for customers to explore and order from.

faqs.question: Do I need to pay to list my service?
faqs.answer: Currently, listing your service is free. However, we may introduce premium listing options in the future for enhanced visibility.

faqs.question: Can I use your delivery service for my orders?
faqs.answer: Yes! Providers listed with us can opt to use our delivery network for seamless order fulfillment.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept payments via mobile banking (e.g., bKash, Nagad), debit/credit cards, and cash on delivery.

faqs.question: Are there any additional fees for using Quick Foods?
faqs.answer: No, there are no hidden fees. The price you see is the price you pay unless otherwise stated during checkout.

faqs.question: What is included in the student meal packages?
faqs.answer: Our student packages include nutritious and affordable options for breakfast, lunch, snacks, and dinner. Each package is designed to meet dietary needs while staying budget-friendly.

faqs.question: Can I customize my student meal package?
faqs.answer: Yes, customization options are available. You can select your preferred dishes based on your tastes and dietary restrictions.

faqs.question: What does the ingredient delivery service include?
faqs.answer: We provide fresh, high-quality ingredients such as vegetables, spices, meat, and more, directly to catering providers. This ensures the meals served are made with pure and reliable ingredients.

faqs.question: How can catering providers sign up for ingredient delivery?
faqs.answer: Catering providers can sign up for our ingredient delivery service by filling out the registration form on our website. Our team will get in touch with the details.

faqs.question: Who do I contact if I have an issue with my order?
faqs.answer: If you face any issues, you can reach out to our customer support team via email at *support@cateringconnects.com* or call us at *+880-XXXX-XXXXXX*

faqs.question: Can I cancel or modify my order?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel or modify your order within a specific time frame. Please refer to our cancellation policy for more details.
